arts.ttl: Out-Of-Sorts Lazio Suffer Shocking Beatdown as Bologna Make Champions League Statement
arts.sum: The out-of-form Lazio extended their uninspiring run, as they suffered their heaviest defeat to Bologna since 1957/58. Lazio Starting Lineup Marco Baroni had entire squad to choose from aside from Fisayo Dele-Bashiru. He decided to unleash a 4-2-3-1 formation, with Matias Vecino acting as an attacking midfielder behind Boulaye Dia. arts.sum: This week we remember a fundamental win for Lazio’s first scudetto, derby triumphs, good European results, and the passing of a legend, Aldo Puccinelli. arts.ttl: Bologna vs Lazio, a fight for the Champions League
arts.sum: Bologna have won their last three league games, in the last 55 years only once have they recorded at least four consecutive wins in Serie A: six between February and March 2024. Bologna have kept a clean sheet in their last four league games at the Dall`Ara against Lazio, already a record streak of consecutive home clean sheets for the Rossoblu against the Biancocelesti in Serie A.

arts.ttl: Bologna vs Lazio | Serie A | Team News & Probable Lineups
arts.sum: On the 29th matchday of Serie A, Bologna and Lazio will share the pitch in a direct showdown for a Champions League spot. Barring any postponements due to the weather conditions, the contest will take place at the Renato Dall’Ara. It kicks off at 15:00 CET.
